Literature.Title: Variations in amino acid composition of antisense peptide-phosphorodiamidate morpholino oligomer affect potency against Escherichia coli in vitro and in vivo.
Literature.Author: Mellbye BL, Puckett SE, Tilley LD, Iversen PL, Geller BL

Literature.Title: Impact of different cell penetrating peptides on the efficacy of antisense therapeutics for targeting intracellular pathogens.

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli K-12 W3110(MIC=0.625µM),Listeria monocytogenes ATCC 19114(MIC=128µM),Listeria monocytogenes F4244(MIC=>128µM),Listeria monocytogenes ATCC 19112(MIC=>128µM),Listeria monocytogenes ATCC 19111(MIC=32µM)
